item.title: Mark Your Calendar April 12th – Jencor Event
item.dc:creator: jencormortgage
item.description: Trail Appliances Exclusive Shopping Event – Thursday April 12, 2012. Time 6pm-9pm. With Free Culinary Demonstrations and Samples. RSVP at info@jencormortgage.com or call 403.245.3636. Bring your Jencor Preferred Partners Card or get one! Continue reading →

item.title: Calgary housing starts picture looks bright – Growth expected in the future
item.dc:creator: jencormortgage
item.description: Short and long term expectations for housing starts in the Calgary census metropolitan area are positive, according to the Conference Board of Canada. In releasing its latest Metro Housing Starts report Tuesday, the board said the seasonally-adjusted annual rate of … Continue reading →

item.title: Building Relationships on Credit Repair
item.dc:creator: jencormortgage
item.description: A Credit Report is obviously a critical element of every mortgage application. Credit granters rely increasingly on the data within credit reports – and particularly on the credit score – in making lending decisions. As a mortgage professional, you need to understand … Continue reading →

item.title: Five ways to file your taxes on time with technology
item.dc:creator: jencormortgage
item.description: Filing your taxes has never been easier. No more having to spend an evening with complicated tax forms, pencils and a calculator. By simply installing software, visiting a website or scanning a T4 slip with a cellphone and then electronically … Continue reading →

item.title: New house prices rise in Calgary – January prices 0.3% higher than previous month
item.dc:creator: jencormortgage
item.description: Rising new home prices in Calgary in January contributed to a national gain across the country, says Statistics Canada. In reporting its New Housing Price Index on Thursday, the federal agency said new home prices in Canada rose 0.1 per … Continue reading →
